content.raw: I was under the assumption we would have the ROS topics exposed so obviously would like to see this. I'm not expert enough on the ROS transport to know how well it would work. But IMO using the ROS throttling capabilities should be sufficient for managing the bandwidth. The downlink IMO isn't that slow, but I go back to when using 110 baud modems was the norm.
